turkish_example_sentence: Biz fakir aileye bol para versek, çocuklar okula gidebilir.
english_example_sentence: If we were to give plenty of money to the poor family, the children could go to school.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы мы дали много денег бедной семье, дети могли бы ходить в школу.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Biz fakir aileye bol para ______, çocuklar okula gidebilir.
